# User Guide

This guide provides comprehensive documentation for using the system.

## Installation

To install the system, follow these steps:

1. Download the latest release
2. Extract the archive
3. Run the installer

## Configuration

Configure the system by editing the configuration file:

```yaml
title: My Documentation
baseURL: https://example.com/
theme: hextra
```

## Usage

Use the system by running:

```bash
docbuilder build -c config.yaml
```

This will generate your documentation site.

## Troubleshooting

If you encounter issues:

- Check the logs
- Verify your configuration
- Consult the FAQ
